message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value for us, but its true worth to you is even greater. Given its significance and the potential it holds for you, we propose to offer it to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production and development but also acknowledges the substantial value you perceive in this product. We believe this offer strikes a fair balance between our interests and your expectations. We look forward to discussing this further with you.
